archimate:Requirement.name: TM.1.4.8a: a) application of structured analytical approaches, such as those that are hypothesis-driven (analysing available information to test a given hypothesis), analyst-driven (following the instinct of the analyst) or contrarian (in which every aspect of the analysis is challenged)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
